page.title: 18BUILDING IN STURTON
page.content: ALTHOUGH STURTON IS VERY SMALL RURAL COMMANITY IT HAS NOT BEEN LEFT BEHIND IN TERMS OF KEEPING UP WITH THE TWENTIETH CENTURY. THERE IS A MODEN TELEPHONE EXCHANGE AND ALL NUMBERS IN STURTON BEGIN WITH 880 AND HAS A GAINSBOROUGH EXCHANGE. SEVERAL TELECOM VANS OPERATE EXCHANGE. AND ITS QUITE A BOSY PLACE. THERE IS ALSO A NEW VILLAGE HALL WHICH WAS BUILT A FEW YEARS AGO BY MONEY AND LAND MAINLY GIVEN BY MR FOLJAMBE OF OSBERTON ESTATE.THE HALL IS USED QUITE A LOT FOR A VARIETY OF DIFFERENT THINGS.THERE IS AN AEROBICS CLASS ON MONDAYS AND THE WELCOME CLUB AND SENIOR CITIZENS USE IT ON A TUESDAY.THE YOUTH CLUB IS HELD THERE AND THE DRAMA GROUP PUT ON THEIR PLAYS THERE. THE SCHOOL USE IT FOR DRAMA AND P.E. AND THOUGH THE YEAR .
